Summary: Light Followed Car for over an hour
trends: There has been one other sighting in Colts Neck
There were no other sightings in Colts Neck on or around September 15th 1988
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding home at approx. 3AM near Colts Neck, NJ when a light appeared in my front window. It followed me turn for turn for over 1 hour never leaving my view in the front window. Made several 90 degree turns and the sphere never left the view of my front window. Finally got near East Brunswick, NJ and the light (sphere) disappeared as fast as it came.
